message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product.  Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To find a middle ground, I propose a price of $1,150,000. This reflects the true worth of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to find a middle ground, but I'm still a bit hesitant at $1,150,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $900,000.
